message.body: The sipps tell me you know about hiking trips/programs. Is that true/if so tell me more
Yes I do! Are you taking time off before college too? Or are you just looking for something in the summer
More just for the summer. Like a week long or two week long trip

Ok well the programs I'm looking at for the fall have lots of summer trips too, KNOLS and outward bound. They're aren't really any week long trips, most are 3 weeks, but they're some 2 week ones too. If you want me to help you I'm free tonight

Also those 2 are kinda regimented, cause they're like the most well known, so u better hop to it as far as signing up. Also I want to go backpacking for a few days really bad this summer, and I'm looking for backpacking buddies! And I also really want to visit the sipps and hike up there too!! Just for a few more options!
Yes yes all this sounds great to me!!! I'm not free tonight boo but I shall do a lot of research! :)
Yes yes! And let me know about anything else! Also I think I'm gonna call Angelina, who's with Anna Harris, who did KNOLS last year, if your interested in they're programs
I feel ya! I hate sitting around here, I gotta do something too
I was wondering what it is that Anna Harris did!! Yes I would love to hear about what she did and whether or not she enjoyed it. I just really want to get out there this summer
Feel free to come over anytime and well call, I'm literally doing nothing
